title: AP finance dept issues orders to immediately provide data on pending dues - ThePrint
content: AP finance dept issues orders to immediately provide data on pending dues  ThePrint
description: Amaravati, Mar 18 (PTI) With senior bureaucrats of the Andhra Pradesh government making a beeline to the High Court in recent days in contempt cases and facing flak over non-clearance of pending bills, the state finance department has asked all other departments to forthwith furnish complete data on pending payments. Once the departments submits all [â€¦]
